reviews.review: Une bonne histoire, un bon solo, un bon coop et un éditeur ? Que demande le peuple ?
smashing fun
Way better and funnier than the first game. A must buy!

Portal 2 a su s'inscrire dans la continuation du précédent volet tout en inovant certains points. La difficulté des énigmes et casse-tête est variable. De plus le scénario du jeu s'inscrit dans la logique des tests. Un très bon jeu qui, depuis la sortie du DLC de "l'initiative de test perpétuelle" interesse une communautée de plus en plus large. Un jeu a essayer au moins pour la beauté des graphismes et le scénario prenant.
Do it..
Uno de los Must Have!
this game is the best game ever !!!!!!!
Makes you feel smart

This is VALVe... Making a great sequel yet again. Not only singleplayer is amazing and fresh, with a very strong story, but the co-op is one of the best co-op games out there. And with the steam workshop and community maps for both singleplayer and co-op, it's literally an endless fun! VALVe at it's best, this game is perfect!

Tons of hours of playing available and a co-op mode which is awesome.

Just as good as Portal - Fantastic physics, and a fully addictive action/puzzler with an amazing story that perfectly follows and elaborates on the original Portal. If you've never played the Portal games, do it. Do it now.

This is one of those games where you either like the game or don't but if you are good at puzzles, then this will be the game for you. There are so many improvements that make the game so much better than the original. I don't know why but everytime I play this game it always relaxes me and makes me think harder than ever.

Single player hilarious, ending a bit weaker tho.  Co-op is awesome in this game and the community contributed maps make this a cult classic

It's a puzzle game, a co-op game, an RPG without the clutter and simply the perfect sequel to the groundbreaking original.  It's everything Portal was and more.  GlaDos is back but this time is she friend or foe?  It's a new expansive world that gives the player a fascinating backstory into the inner workings of Aperture Science and the Portal story.  It's far removed from it's humber Half Life spinoff roots and in many ways superior to them.

Probably the best new feature, however, is the co-op gameplay where you and a friend can explore the test chambers under the watchful and wise cracking supervision of GladDos.  

Better than the original and worth a buy.
Must have. Awesome game with the most hilarious script ever.
just amazing, no other words describe this game series, highly recommend this game.

Everything I said in my recommendation about the original Portal game + a whole lot of fun playing co-op maps with your friends(or enemies)!  Poor Chell, dragged back into testing after being so close to freedom.  Well, she may finally achieve freedom in this game.  After the last test subject is gone, who does GlaDOS turn to for testing?  Well, there seems to be a test-subject storage area which is cut off from the main facility.  Better get some bots calibrated so they can work together to unite GlaDOS with those new test subjects!  Thus:  two player, Co-op mode is born!  Add the Perpetual Testing Initiative for more co-op content and you've got a winner of a game!

Puzzles aren't quite as challenging as Portal 1, but it's still fun and a bit of a brain teaser, and got a solid story with excellent characters. Keeps you thinking, also very funny at times. And there's always people making custom maps so those are fun to play through. Now if only everyone would stop quoting the damn memes that spawned from this thing.
this is a epic game with puzzels portals and robots and some time,s you will be flying across the room
Only complaint was the game was way too short for how good it was. Dialogue, Music, Graphics, Gameplay... A+

Its a great game with hours of fun. Then the coop puzzles give you even more hours of challanges. And now unlimited user created levels. One of the best games I have got.

Truly an piece of art when it comes to gaming, anyone with a sense of dark humor, a TRUSTED friend for co-op, and someone who can think outside the box (and inside it as well, considering that WILL be needed.) will enjoy this game. Characters are amazing and will make you laugh. Thinking with portals will enthrall you, and so will the content people can make.
Genialidad absoluta.

One of the best games I have ever played! Really fun and interesting action puzzle game with great storytelling and after all story its self.

Urm... Yeah. Its freaking Portal for goodness' sake. If you don't already own this game, you're obviously just not into games that want you to think.

Tanto el Portal 1 como el Portal 2 (mejor jugarlos en orden ya que tienen una buena historia) son de los juegos más originales y adictivos a los que he jugado nunca. El sistema de portales es una maravilla y hará que te estrujes el coco para sobrevivir y seguir adelante.
Los puzzles que hay que resolver para recorrer las salas y conservar la vida están creados perfectamente, con una curva de dificultad perfecta.
En este portal 2, además hay una (o varias) historias que se dejan entrever y tanto los protagonistas como hasta la más insignifcante torreta tienen algo que decir.
El modo cooperativo (tanto online como a pantalla partida) es una maravilla, un montón de niveles nuevos en los que tienes que coordinar y pensar con tu compañero para pasar las fases. Es imposible pasar los niveles sin ayuda del compañero. Todo ello aderezado con las locas palabras de Glados todo el rato y con unas cuantas sorpresas.
Indispensable.
Um dos jogos mais inteligentes que eu já vi e que não cai no tédio pela sua historinha simples e com boas piadas.

Demasiado fácil por momentos, no llega al nivel del 1 en cuanto a jugabilidad, y los mapas, pesar de ser muy lindos estéticamente, son muy obvios y solo tienen una posibilidad para avanzar, pero no deja de ser muy divertido.

Most excellent atmoshere and story. Stephen Merchant did a wonderful job (speaking the role of Wheatley).
A must-play for everyone who remotely likes video games.

One of the most creative games I've ever played. With multiple ways to use your own methods to solve puzzles, and a superb comedic performance. The only thing holding you back is your own imagination. Puzzles have never been this fun and satisfying to solve. This one rightly deserves to be one of 2011's Games of the Year.
Lots of falling upwards

Really amazing game, the single player doesn't last quite as long as you'd hope, but it's brilliantly funny all the way through and there's also the co-op and the community built test chambers to add to the game

This game is a thrilling combination of story, backstory, and foremost, puzzles.  The format in which the plot is presented is both intriguing and immersive.  The gameplay is smooth and easy to follow, and the co-op feature is a brilliant continuation of the single-player storyline.  Highly recommended :3

Portal 2 a tout pour nous faire plaisir : le retour de la charmante (et rancunière!) GladOS, un nemesis stupide comme une pelle à tarte, et un retour au source d'Aperture Science.
Le Portal Gun est toujours là, pour notre plus grand plaisir, et maintenant accompagnés de gelé répulsive et autres substance  qui complexifient encore les énigmes.
D'une durée de vie un peu plus longue que Portal 1, le jeux reste assez court à finir, surtout du fait qu'on a du mal à le lâcher !

THIS IS AWESOME GAME!!! YOU MUST PLAY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!

THe epiciest game of valve! WOW!

COOP also awesome. 

This is epic great time that I spent to this game. I dont worried, im epic happy!

BUY! PLAY! ENJOY! BE HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!

Головоломка. Если вам не ебет мозг ваша жена или другое чудо природы, смело покупайте игру со скидкой 75%! Прошу заметить, изначально игру разрабатывали студенты Института Технологий DigiPen (Nuclear Monkey Software), будучее название Narbacular Drop, но хитрожопые Valve переделали под свой лад и получили свои овации, что и с dota2...

Generally more of the same, but improved a bit.

I HATE WHEATLEY! Stupid blabbermouth bugger....

Segunda parte de Portal. Juego de puzzles a través de dos portales bidireccionales con una historia cargada de humor negro, mediante un guión magistral, y todo tan sencillo que resulta complejo explicar lo buen juego que es. Los puzzles resultan fluidos y adictivos que, combinados con la historia, enganchan hasta el último momento. El multijudador cooperativo añade unas cuantas horas de campaña y con el editor puedes desatar toda tu creatividad para compartirla con la comunidad.
Muito bom o work shop
Get this game, it's awesome!
It's the best logical game I have ever played.
A game for any valve fan
sehr, wirklich SEHR gut.

Eu diria que o primeiro jogo da série é mais uma versão beta desta perfeita sequência, mas com certeza eu recomendaria que fosse jogado antes deste. Portal 2 é um jogo completo. Não acho que posso falar muita coisa do jogo. Só direi uma coisa: jogue-o! Desde o primeiro, Portal faz o jogador se sentir dentro do clima que o jogo quer que o mesmo sinta. Parece óbvio? Novamente: jogue-o!
go buy this game, then play coop with me!!
This game is pretty cool.  Yep.  So, uh, you shoot the walls and they become pathways to an alternate dimension in which magic is real.
I love this game
Einfach Genial !!
Il est vraiment sympa!
This game is epic.  I loved playing Portal but Portal 2 is just incredible.  The plot is much more developed and the new test chamber elements make for even better game play.

Portal 2 delivers an excellent single player experience which lasted around 12 hours for me to complete, the puzzles got harder as you went along, I often found myself stuck in certain test chambers. The storyline of Portal 2 is one which will keep you playing, as during the middle of the game, a huge shock happens which I wont spoil, but I just had to see what happens next. The singleplayer isn't the only part of Portal 2 however, the all new Co Op mode lasted around 10 hours itself, which lacked storyline but was still alot of more than the Singleplayer as you had to work with someone else, which worked really slick and smoothly (especially the ping tool, that was just great), the Co Op mode also comes equipped with the Robot Enrichment micro transactions store, kind of like the Man Co Store in TF2, this adds purely costmic customizations for your Co Op character, whch I think is a really good addition to the game for those people who have spare money to spend.
it has hats

Коператив на высоте

Okay, for those who haven't played Portal? Go play Portal!... Now for those who have played Portal. You are all in for an amazing ride! Complicated, but fun puzzles worth solving, an engaging single player and co-op campaign. Best of all, robots with funny humor! That is right, GLaDOS is back! (along with a new AI that is just as humorous!) Valve once again gives the fans a blessing by releasing this game. It is worth all the time and money you have! :)

Overall: 90/100
this game is hard but it has a good story and good puzzles and its kinda funny and also it has community levels so i tottaly recomend this plus it runs really fast and hardly has any glitches.
Mein Lieblingsspiel und eine echte Kaufempfehlung! Geniale Story, gute (und schwierige) Levels und ein Spaß auf längere Zeit durch den Steam-Workshop (Benutzer-Levels). Wers noch nicht hat KAUFEN!
